body.p: Which of the following are techniques that can be used to increase interpretability with high accuracy algorithms:

multiple_choice.choice: Train an interpretable regression model and an interpretable decision tree and average their predictions.
Use a black box model to predict when traditional deployed models need to be retrained, and do so before their predictive power lessens.

feedback.p: Correct: Both techniques of using a black box model in deployment process and training ensemble models will be helpful in balancing the tradeoff.
Incorrect: Although this is one of the correct solutions, the other option is equally correct.
Incorrect: Although this is one of the correct solutions, the other option is equally correct.
